name: Recharge, Bulb Kid!!
description:
The Story

Bulb Kid has started malfunctioning and only the almighty Lone Reloader can fix him. But be careful, because Bulb Kid's ammo is also his life! Would you be able to help him get to the throne room and be repaired avoiding all malfunctioning robotic creatures in the power plant?

Features

  • Manage your ammo carefully : With only 4 shots (and one for autodestruction) before shutting down, aim wisely and look for safe spots to recharge your life!
  • Action platformer: Run your way through the power plant!
  • Original music composed just for the game in a retro synth style!

Controls

The game supports both keyboard and controller. Next we've listed all the possible actions and their counterparts in both play modes respectively:

  • Move: WASD / Left Joystick
  • Jump / Double Jump: W / A
  • Dash: K / RT
  • Shoot: J / X
  • Recharge: L / B

We hope you'll like our little prototype, even when it could have ended being more awesome!
